name: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
desc: Attributes define the type of playlist.

items.name: static var onTheGo: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
items.desc: A playlist created on a device rather than synced from the Music app.

items.name: static var smart: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
items.desc: A smart playlist includes items that match one or more user-specified rules.

items.name: static var genius: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
items.desc: A Genius playlist includes items related to other items in your Music library.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
